Class RELAXReader

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, IDContextProvider2, ValidationContext, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
RELAXCoreReader, RELAXNSReader
public abstract class RELAXReader
extends GrammarReader

reads RELAX grammar/module by SAX2 and constructs abstract grammar model.

Author:
Kohsuke KAWAGUCHI
